Description:
An established private medical center in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia is seeking a skilled and experienced Internal Medicine Doctor to join their team. The ideal candidate should have a minimum of 2 years of experience in Internal Medicine in KSA and be licensed as an internal medicine doctor to practice in Saudi Arabia. The candidate should be well-versed in diagnosing and treating various medical conditions. The Internal Medicine Doctor will be responsible for providing comprehensive medical care to patients, including diagnosing illnesses, prescribing medications, and providing ongoing treatment and management.Responsibilities:Conduct thorough medical assessments and evaluations of patients.
Diagnose and treat various medical conditions, including chronic illnesses.
Prescribe medications and provide ongoing treatment and management.
Order and interpret diagnostic tests, such as blood tests and imaging studies.
Collaborate with other healthcare professionals to develop and implement treatment plans.
Provide education and counseling to patients and their families regarding their medical conditions and treatment options.
Maintain accurate and up-to-date medical records and documentation.
Stay informed about the latest advancements in Internal Medicine and participate in continuing medical education.
Adhere to all ethical and professional standards set forth by the medical center.Skills
Skills:
Minimum of 2 years of experience in Internal Medicine inside KSA
Valid license to practice Internal Medicine in Saudi Arabia.
Excellent diagnostic and problem-solving skills.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
Ability to work well in a multidisciplinary team.
Detail-oriented and able to maintain accurate medical records.
Commitment to providing high-quality patient care.
Ability to stay updated on the latest advancements in Internal Medicine.
Fluency in English and Arabic.
Proficiency in electronic medical records systems.
Knowledge of medical laws and regulations in Saudi Arabia.
Ability to effectively communicate complex medical information to patients.
Strong problem-solving and critical-thinking skills.
Empathy and compassion towards patients.
